mbfont_hdr_t Struct Reference

Defines the header for a monochrome bitmap font. More...

#include <mbfont.h>

Detailed Description

A monochrome bitmap font looks like this in memory (or a file):

mbfont_hdr_t hdr; mbfont_char_t char0; mbfont_char_t char1; ... mbfont_char_t char94; const char char0_data[char0.height][MFont::byte_width(char0.width)]; const char char1_data[char1.height][MFont::byte_width(char1.width)]; ... const char char94_data[char0.height][MFont::byte_width(char94.width)];

Definition at line 28 of file mbfont.h.
